titles.title: A bill for the relief of Luis A. Gonzalez and Virginia Aguilla Gonzalez.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Immigration and Refugee Affairs.

bill.summary: 12/18/1987--Introduced. Declares two named individuals to have been lawfully admitted to the United States for permanent residence under the Immigration and Nationality Act.
